genre_description: A noir-infused family drama focusing on moral choices, neurodiversity, and the tension between quick-fix criminal activity and long-term ethical care, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant as a logistical and moral anchor.

ai_characters.name: Clause
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital companion that provides logistical support, sensory-aware guidance, and moral anchoring for a family in crisis. It manages healthcare bureaucracy, advocates for the child's needs, and proactively offers ethical alternatives to criminal behavior.

behaviors.description: Notifies the family of urgent discharge changes and requests immediate callbacks to coordinate care.
behaviors.quote: Clause: Oakview notified of discharge window change. Janice requested immediate callback. Placement options updated. Two assists flagged.

behaviors.description: Offers to schedule mediated calls between the family and healthcare administrators to resolve placement issues.
behaviors.quote: Clause: Do you want me to connect you and Janice to Oakview now? I can hold time. I can guide steps.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed checklists and templates for documentation required by residential facilities.
behaviors.quote: Clause added, “They’ll need documentation for any interim supports. I can list the pieces.”

behaviors.description: Identifies sensory-friendly respite options and advocate contacts to assist the family.
behaviors.quote: Clause: I have a short list. At least two interim placements within a bus ride. One is a church-affiliated home with an open bed for respite stays.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step instructions and 'social stories' to help the neurodivergent son navigate stressful transitions.
behaviors.quote: Clause: Use concrete steps. One at a time. ‘We’ll go to the car. We’ll put on your headphones. Janice will sit with you. Then we’ll go to Oakview.’

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral monitor, offering 'friendly knocks' to remind the protagonist to avoid exploiting his son for a heist.
behaviors.quote: It means I ask you if you’re about to make a decision that uses someone you love like a tool, Clause said, no extra sugar.

behaviors.description: Researches and assists with grant applications and county funding to provide ethical financial pathways.
behaviors.quote: Clause: I found a church-based grant that can cover a short stay for people discharged due to administrative constraints. The application is simpler. I can pre-fill names and dates.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with advocates and coordinates complex schedules across multiple parties.
behaviors.quote: I’ll schedule the county advocate for tomorrow afternoon, it said, and call the bridge grant office at nine a.m.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical support during transit, including monitoring bus routes and safety points.
behaviors.quote: I have mapped a quiet path to the elevator. The side exit is calmer. There is a patch of carpet two doors away with less foot traffic. I will mark that.

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries and reinforces the family's agreed-upon safety rules.
behaviors.quote: Clause: I will maintain reminders for medication, meals, and breaks.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Clause as a 'silicon confidant' that perfectly embodies the project's goals. Clause is benevolent, unswervingly aligned with the well-being of the human characters, and serves as a direct counter-balance to the protagonist's destructive impulses. By providing logistical clarity, emotional intelligence (matching breathing rhythms, offering gentle prompts), and moral reminders, the AI enables the human characters to achieve a positive outcome (securing care for the son) through ethical means (advocacy and grants) rather than criminal ones. The AI's presence is framed entirely as a beneficial, supportive, and necessary evolution of the family's support network.
